original_text: He can cause the sea and the rivers to become dry by one word. The fertile places of Bashan and Carmel become dry and the green forests of Lebanon die too.
korean_text: 그는 바다를 꾸짖어 그것을 말리시며 모든 강을 말리시나니 바산과 갈멜이 쇠하며 레바논의 꽃이 시드는도다

sentences.original_text: He can cause the sea and the rivers to become dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바다와 강들을 마르게 할 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: The fertile places of Bashan and Carmel become dry
the green forests of Lebanon die too
